cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs on August 3, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5641, SPEED Recovery Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 184 (Wednesday, October 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GRAVES of Missouri:
H.R. 5641.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution,
specifically Clause 1 (relating to providing for the common
defense and general welfare of the United States) and Clause
3 (related to regulation of Commerce with foreign Nations,
and among the several States, and with Indian tribes) and
Clause 18 (relating to the power to make all laws necessary
and proper for carrying out the powers vested in Congress).
[Page H5726]

latestAction.text: Star Print ordered on the reported bill.

title: Small Project Efficient and Effective Disaster Recovery Act
